imagePrompt: A wide shot that broadens the perspective, revealing Wu Gang's awakened awareness to his surroundings. He is standing by the osmanthus tree, axe held at rest by his side, his head slightly tilted as if attentively listening or observing. His gaze is directed towards the intricate details of the environment: the osmanthus leaves, depicted with shimmering, silver-flecked clay, and subtle, swirling tendrils of fragrant clay visibly representing the sweet scent of the flowers. In the middle ground, partially obscured by moon rocks or elegant palace architecture, several adorable, plump jade rabbits, made of pristine white clay, are peeking out, their large, curious eyes fixed on Wu Gang. The atmosphere is one of peaceful observation and gentle discovery, captured in a detailed Claymation art style, with a delicate interplay of moonlight and subtle ambient glows that illuminate these newly noticed details.
